trades_with_discord_winner.context: Multiple deals during startup draft with aggressive all-in winner
trades_with_discord_winner.joseph_self_assessment: Believes he made a mistake - seeking navigation help

strategic_concern: Got pulled into winner's aggressive consolidation strategy, may have compromised own depth-based approach

roster_analysis.initial_assessment: Championship ceiling with elite WRs, but massive holes at RB/TE

strategic_pivot.joseph_reframe: Choosing to tank year 1 for lottery pick, rebuild around Jefferson/Lamb/Maye core
strategic_pivot.rebuild_philosophy: Intentional tanking to accelerate rebuild timeline with elite foundation pieces
strategic_pivot.trade_attempts: Has tried trading Lamb for depth but seeking validation on tank strategy
strategic_pivot.tiber_validation: Strategy confirmed as brilliant - accelerated rebuilding with elite anchors better than mediocre competing
strategic_pivot.joseph_final_take: Admits he got fleeced but has foundation to a house, just doesn't know who's going to live in it
